author: Derek Hollier-Day
comment: ...but the app won't appear on the android wear device. Lg urbane. Any thoughts? Will happily relate if you can help

reply.author: Shashank Sharma
reply.content:
Thanks Derek for review. 
Actually how Torelo works is any content shared via mobile Torelo app will appear as notification on paired android wear. You can only perform some actions on that notification. 
I can sense some confusion here as without app appear on the android wear it looks like app is not installed properly.
